EmailTemplate.name: Approved License
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved License
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear License Holder,
Your license has been approved and is now available for download through your home page.
Please reply to this email if you experience any further issues related to this. We appreciate your patience and thank you for your investment in the City of Philadelphia.
Sincerely,
Contact Center Specialist Supervisor/
Liaison for L&I
